description: Haproxy is a reliable and high-performance TCP/HTTP load balancer and proxy server for Linux. It is widely used to enhance web server performance and increase the availability of applications by distributing workloads across multiple backend servers. In this context, Haproxy is utilized for inbound proxying, assisting in managing the incoming traffic effectively. Its fast response time and robust performance make it suitable for handling demanding workloads. Users can configure Haproxy to suit their specific network needs and adjust settings to optimize performance for various types of applications.
